author: benh
msg: Look for external tests in bin rather than src

author: benh
msg: Removed string_map typedef and changed name of data_string to bytes.

author: benh
msg: Reorganized configurator a little and added a call to dump config to Google Log

author: benh
msg: More Makefile updates, in particular, added building into bin and lib directories.

author: benh
msg: - Configurator only looks for MESOS_HOME when running one of the Mesos
binaries (in which case the location is inferred from the binary)
- Do not complain if MESOS_HOME/conf/mesos.conf is not found (but do
report an error if the user specifies --conf and the conf directory
given does not contain a mesos.conf).
- External tests now point to the right shell scripts (but said shell
scripts are not yet fixed to use bin directory).
